mapper.sql: id, gerent_id, shop_id, dishes_class_id, dishes_name, dishes_img, creation_time, creator, creator_id, status, sold_out, serial_no, remark, dishes_price
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.gerent_id gerentId, d.shop_id shopId, d.dishes_class_id dishesClassId, d.dishes_name dishesName, d.dishes_img dishesImg, d.creation_time creationTime, d.creator, d.creator_id creatorId, d.`status`, d.sold_out soldOut, d.serial_no serialNo, d.remark, d.dishes_price dishesPrice, dc.dishes_class_name dishesClassName, dc.serial_no dishesClassSerialNo, dc.remark dishesClassRemark FROM t_dishes d JOIN t_dishes_class dc ON d.dishes_class_id = dc.id WHERE dc.`status` = 1 AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.shop_id = #{shopId} AND (d.dishes_name = #{keyword} OR dc.dishes_class_name = #{keyword}) ORDER BY dc.serial_no, d.serial_no
